column5: As per title does anybody know if those lures (Smackin Jack Lures)are available up in Canada ? If so where ?Thanks a lot guys

You can try www.princeofperch.com This place is in Michigan, but they may mail to Canada. On Dec.-14-02 there was another article about smackin jack lures on this forum by T-TODD Just use the forum search engine to find. If you dial up princeofperch you may have to use the GOOGLE search engine. I could not get it up with msn. GOOGLE is the best anyway. Hope this helps.
